body: Thanks for the suggestion. I've gone one step further and moved this to `THTensorMath.c` so it can use `THTensor(digamma_one)` internally once https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3955 is merged. This seems like a better location than `THTensorRandom` because as you observe there is no random generation going on: this is merely a useful special function.
